taskDescription: Drag the terms on the right into the correct boxes on the left.
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
textField:
*Clickbait*: An article with a sensational or misleading headline and content which doesnâ€™t live up to its attention-grabbing promise. These pages are usually rife with advertisements.

*Post-truth*: The Oxford English Dictionary defines this as 'relating to or denoting circumstances in which objective facts are less influential in shaping political debate or public opinion than appeals to emotion and personal belief'.

*Disinformation*: A deliberate attempt to spread false information. Designed to be widely shared, its purpose is often to persuade people to think or vote a certain way, or to make money from advertising accompanying it.

*Misinformation*: False information which may also be shared widely and quickly, but in this instance the author was unaware the information was untrue.

*Junk Science*: Ideas and theories that seem to be well researched and scientific but in fact have little evidence to support them. 

*Hate News*: Sources that actively promote lies encouraging racism, misogyny, homophobia and other forms of discrimination.
